channel.title: Blogs on WingedDemonFox.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on WingedDemonFox.dev

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome, dear reader to my new blog. Here I will tell tales about various adventures through IT. The main focus will be on programming projects but I plan to branch off to other topics as well. Have a great day!

item.title: Kotlin Adventures 1
item.description: This is the beginning of my adventure with Kotlin and Mobile Development. After years of working as a Microsoft Dynamics CRM/365 developer and teaching myself WPF, I wanted to try something entirely new: Mobile Development. My first choice was Xamarin, but previous experience in an educational environment wasn’t great and with recent changes in the .NET environment I decided against it. So I started using Android Studio and Kotlin as programming language.
